mapper.sql: select id, rwid, xyid, jd, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from t_task_student
mapper.update: update t_task_student set jd = JSON_SET(jd, "$.completed",#{completed},"$.rate",#{rate}) where rwid = #{rwid} and xyid=#{xyid}
update t_task_student set jd = JSON_SET(jd, "$.lastStudy.current",#{current},"$.lastStudy.source_type",'kj') where rwid = #{rwid} and xyid=#{xyid}
